title: Three Misfortunes
description: I'm just an average teenage witch secretly dating my vampire boyfriend and trying not to die.  When a night at the carnival results in three misfortunes slowly coming true, I'm left with no option but to reverse my fate. If only I knew howâ€¦  Even with a vampire and a werewolf at my side, I might not make it to midnight. Maybe none of us will. Magic got us into this mess, maybe magic can get us out.  *This story is told in dual pov by a teenage witch and the British fortune teller who cast her fate. Perfect for fans of That's So Raven.
author: B.L. Koller
